    public {itemname}AdvancedSpecification({itemname}AdvancedFilter filter)
    {
        DateTime today = DateTime.UtcNow;
        var todayrange = today.GetDateRange({itemname}ListView.TODAY.ToString(), filter.CurrentUser.LocalTimeOffset);
        var last30daysrange = today.GetDateRange({itemname}ListView.LAST_30_DAYS.ToString(),filter.CurrentUser.LocalTimeOffset);

        Query.Where(q => q.Name != null)

    }
